H0.text: What is the upper edge of the ship’s side next to the bulwarks called. Rail

H1.text: What is the upper edge of the ship’s side next to the bulwarks called. Wale

H2.text: What is the upper edge of the ship’s side next to the bulwarks called. Bulwark Edge

H3.text: What is the upper edge of the ship’s side next to the bulwarks called. Gunwale

A4.text: The gunwale is the top edge of the hull of a ship or boat.

A5.text: On a narrowboat or canal boat, the gunwale is synonymous with the side deck—a narrow ledge running the full length of the craft.
